authentication_protection/description: Sign in to save your progress and access your decks from any device.
create_deck_page/description: Provide details and add your cards.
create_deck_title/length_error: This field must be 50 characters or less, here it's {length} long.
decks_actions/dialog/create_deck/errors/: Each card must have front and back text.
Front and back languages must be different.
Title must be 50 characters or fewer.
decks_list_placeholder/description: You can create or search for lessons made by the community.
params_account_section/section/descripti: Manage your account settings and authentication.
params_danger_zone/delete_account_button: Delete your account and all your data ?
params_danger_zone/section/description: These actions are irreversible. Use with caution.
params_select_language/section/descripti: We automatically detect your language based on your browser settings. But, you can change it here.
params_select_theme/section/description: Because we have different tastes, we have different themes. Click on a theme to apply it and see how it looks.
params_session_behavior/how_many_words_t: How many new cards to learn ?
How many cards in randomize mode ?
params_session_behavior/section/descript: Here, you can select the number of cards displayed in each session.
session_ended_splash_screen/session_end_: You reviewed <totalKbd>{total}</totalKbd> cards. <knownKbd>{known}</knownKbd> cards are mastered, but <unknownKbd>{unknown}</unknownKbd> will need more review.
session_reviewed_words_table/cards_to_re: Cards you need to review again.

session_reviewed_words_table/next_due_to: This card will be reviewable again on {date}
